channel.title: Yasunari Kawabata on un01s notes
channel.description: Recent content in Yasunari Kawabata on un01s notes

item.title: time
item.description:
“Time flows in the same way for all human beings; every human being flows through time in a different way.” ― Yasunari Kawabata

“For clearly it is impossible to touch eternity with one hand and life with the other.” ― Yukio Mishima, The Temple of the Golden Pavilion
